meanings.definition: Of poor quality or inferior; cheap or tacky.
meanings.sent1: The schlocky toy broke after just one day of playing.
meanings.sent2: The schlocky movie had terrible special effects.
meanings.sent3: The schlocky costume made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The schlocky painting looked like a child's finger-painting.
meanings.sent5: The schlocky furniture fell apart as soon as we sat on it.

meanings.definition: Sentimental or melodramatic in an exaggerated or clichéd way.
meanings.sent1: The schlocky romance novel made her cry with its predictable plot.
meanings.sent2: The schlocky soap opera had over-the-top acting.
meanings.sent3: The schlocky love song played at every wedding.
meanings.sent4: The schlocky drama felt like a parody of itself.
meanings.sent5: The schlocky sentimental movie left everyone in tears.
